titleStmt.title: A helpe to true happinesse. Or A briefe and learned exposition of the maine and fundamentall points of Christian religion. By Mr. Paul Bayne
titleStmt.author: Baynes, Paul, d. 1617.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. Griffin for W. Bladen, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the Bible, neere the great north doore of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the signe of the Bible, neere the great north doore of Pauls
